task.title: Task: Axis Titles
task.shortdesc: Titles along the horizontal and vertical axis are important parts of a chart.

context.p: Axis titles are titles along the horizontal and vertical axis and and help you to understand what the data is about.

step.cmd: Click the Charts Element button, the plus sign next to the chart and you'll see a list of chart elements.
Check Axis Titles and a title is immediately added to both axis.

info.note: Besides is an arrow and by clicking on it you get the continuation menu for more options.

step.cmd: Change the horizontal title in Time.
Change the vertical title in Sales (x 1000 euros).

info.note: When the axis titles are selected, they can be dragged to another place in the chart area.
